title: 3DStreet Model
description: 3DStreet Model Schema for the 3DStreet Model Directory

id.description: The unique identifier of the model, format is 'author.model-name'.

name.description: The display name of the model.

preview.description: The preview image of the model.

modelURL.description: The URL of the 3D model asset.

partName.description: The named node within the glTF model asset that represents this model.

longDescription.description: The long description of the model with basic markdown support.

modelDimensions.description: The dimensions of the model in meters (height, width, depth).

licenseName.description: The short name of the model's license.

licenseDetails.description: The long description of the model's license.

licenseLink.description: The URL of the model's license.

copyrightEntity.description: The entity that owns primary copyright of the model.

copyrightDetails.description: The copyright details of the model.

authorName.description: The name of the model's author.

authorLink.description: The URL of the model's author.

streetmixSegmentName.description: The Streetmix segment name for the model.

streetmixSegmentVariant.description: The Streetmix segment variant for the model.

sourceURL.description: The URL of the model's source file.
